EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_2nd Annual Ping Pong Tourney_Q216.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the 2nd Annual SaaS Ping Pong Tournament. Beer, Pizza, and of course some ping pong! 32 Teams representing 32 companies (1 team per company). So many companies have ping pong tables but it's time to find out who has the best players. Please find the event details below:
When: Thursday, April 7, 2016 from 6-9pm Where: Pivotal, 875 Howard Street, 5th Floor, San Francisco
Follow tweets about the tournament live that day using #SaaSPingPong
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
